Kobe Bryant managed just 18 points while committing six turnovers in 41 minutes. "I don't approach the game like it's Kobe Bryant , and I want to have a big game against him," Allen Iverson said. I want to play a good game against everybody. When you play well against another great player, it's only natural for you to feel good about the win. But that's not the most important thing for me. Young People's Learning Agency for England, which is responsible for college funding, to the Department for Education. Michael Gove , the education secretary, said he was abolishing the the School Support Staff Negotiating Body because it does not fit well with the government's priorities for greater deregulation. But the Association of School and College Leaders has said the move is "a retrograde step" and could lead to staff who "play an immensely important role in providing high-quality education" being underpaid.
